string.value: I hear #b#p2081001##k of Leafre is curious about someone's whereabouts

#b#p2081001##k in Leafre was wondering about the whereabouts of the heroic knight that rescued him a long time ago. His name is #b#p2081007##k... So I promised #b#p2081001##k to find the knight that disappeared into the Dragon's Forest.
I was able to find #b#p2081007##k, the man responsible for saving Kumo from the monsters, at Wyvern Canyon.

Oh, hello there. You must be from out of town. I've been seeing a lot of travelers here lately. It wasn't so long ago when spotting a human being at Minar Forest was a once-a-year thing. It was that rare.

A long time ago, when I was a kid, some human being dropped by here. I was being chased by a monster when the person came in and saved me. He regularly camped out in the forest. I was very much in awe of him, so I went into the forest all the time to see him.

But a while later, he left this place with only a word that he was heading off to the Dragon Forest. Seeing you suddenly reminds me of him. I'd like to know what happened to him since the day he left. I'm sure you travel to many places yourself. Can you please find out his current whereabouts?

You are a kind person indeed. Since he last headed off to Dragon Forest, I suggest you start the search from there. If you ever find him, please let me know that I'd like nothing more than to meet up with him once more.\nHis name is #b#p2081007##k.
You must not be fond of traveling around. I thought everyone outside this town would be a traveler of some sort.
Hmmm... quite a surprise to run into a human being here... this is great. Nice to meet you.\r\n#b#L0#Are you #p2081007# by any chance?#l
That's right. How did you know my name?\r\n#b#L0# I've been looking for you through #p2081001#'s request.#l
Kumo?... Ahhh~ that little kid from the Hafring tribe.
